entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
